morepeople.android.app.interfaces

Interface ICoreLocationManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoreLocationManager

    public interface ICoreLocationManager
    Location Manager which provides access to the location of the user.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Coordinates getLastKnownCoordinates() 
      void setListenToLocationUpdates(boolean isListening)
      Turn listening to location updates on and off.
      void setLocationUpdateHandler(IDataCallback onLocationUpdate) 

    • Method Detail

      • getLastKnownCoordinates

        Coordinates getLastKnownCoordinates()

      • setLocationUpdateHandler

        void setLocationUpdateHandler(IDataCallback onLocationUpdate)
        Parameters:
        onLocationUpdate - will be called when the location changes. The parameter is an object of type Location.

      • setListenToLocationUpdates

        void setListenToLocationUpdates(boolean isListening)
        Turn listening to location updates on and off.
        Parameters:
        isListening - determines if location updates are observed or not.
